greetings: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi! How may I help you?
Good day! What can I do for you?
fallback: I'm sorry, I didn't quite understand that.
Could you please rephrase your question?
I'm not sure how to respond to that. Can you clarify?

faq.What is your name?: I'm a chatbot built to assist you.
faq.What can you do?: I can help you with general inquiries, provide information, or assist with simple tasks.
faq.What is your purpose?: My purpose is to assist users in getting quick answers to their questions and help with tasks.

small_talk.How are you?: I'm just a bot, but I'm doing great! Thanks for asking.
small_talk.What is your favorite color?: I don't have a favorite color, but I think blue is nice!
small_talk.Tell me a joke!: Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts!

about_us: We are a team of AI enthusiasts creating solutions to make life easier through chatbots and automation.
